description: Heavenly and pure, imbued with divine power.
Benevolent and graceful, with a touch of celestial might.

features.name: Divine Radiance
features.effect: You and allies within short range regain 5 wounds. If an ally is under the Fear or Cognition condition, they may make a Spirit check to end it.

shackleborn.description: Servants of Brakkus, enforcers of divine order and judgment.

features.name: Chains of Authority
features.effect: Summon celestial chains to bind a nearby creature. On failure, they are Pinned until the end of their next turn.

chronal warden.description: Temporal angels of Chronus, intervening when time frays.

features.name: Chronal Intervention
features.effect: Once per encounter, rewind a failed check by an ally—they may reroll it immediately.

resonance.description: Angels of Dumda who weaponize vibration and clarity.

features.name: Sonic Burst
features.effect: Emit a wave of pure tone. Enemies in short range must make an Observation check or gain the Deaf condition.

empyrean.description: Guides and restorers in service of Exembar, balancing ambition and peace.

features.name: Restorative Balance
features.effect: As an action, heal 10 wounds and remove 1 Cognition condition from an ally.

silent guardian.description: Silent watchers of Jesha, bringing quietude where chaos reigns.

features.name: Field of Silence
features.effect: Create a zone around you where verbal components and sound-based abilities fail for 1 round.

librarian.description: Keepers of lost knowledge and divine memory under Signessen’s gaze.

features.name: Whispered Insight
features.effect: Once per encounter, grant +5 to any check made by an ally within range. They gain the Stunned condition until their next turn.

emissary.description: Agents of Zuinmuir, collectors of souls and silence.

features.name: Eyes of Ending
features.effect: Target must make a Spirit check or gain the Fear condition. If already feared, they must retreat their next turn.

Construct.description: Artificially created beings with a mechanical or magical design.

features.name: Immovable
features.effect: You gain {value} additional armor and resistance to magic-based attacks.

Core.description: Constructs with an imbued magical core.

Arcane.description: A core powered by arcane forces.

features.name: Arcane Core
features.effect: Enhances magical abilities, granting +{value} to {check} rolls for spellcasting.

Dryad.description: A core infused with nature’s spirit.

features.name: Natural Resilience
features.effect: Regenerate {value} wounds at the start of each turn.

features.name: Mystic Echo
features.effect: Mimics magical abilities used within {range} for {duration}.

Adapted.description: A core that adapts to combat needs.

features.name: Adaptive Response
features.effect: Adjusts defenses dynamically, increasing resistance to the last {damage} attack taken.

Cursed.description: A core that brings misfortune to enemies.

features.name: Curse of Misfortune
features.effect: Lowers enemy {check} rolls by {value} for {duration}.

features.name: Metallic Body
features.effect: Resistant to physical damage, reducing all incoming damage by {value}.

Vehicle.description: Constructs designed for transport or combat on the move.

features.name: Ram
features.effect: Charge at enemies, dealing {value} {damage} damage and knocking them prone if they fail a {check}.

Arcane.description: Arcane constructs blending technology and magic.

features.name: Spell Tinker
features.effect: Fires arcane bolts dealing {value} {damage} damage.

Tinker.description: Ingenious constructs built with mechanical ingenuity.

features.name: Precise Strike
features.effect: Delivers calculated damage with +{value} to {check} rolls for accuracy.

Steampunk.description: Constructs powered by steam and gears.

Gearwork.description: A blend of brass and steam.

features.name: Steam Burst
features.effect: Blasts foes with scalding steam, dealing {value} {damage} damage and applying the {condition} condition.

Crystal Golem.description: Hard and refractive, built from crystal.

features.name: Prismatic Shield
features.effect: Deflects energy attacks, reducing incoming {damage} damage by {value}.

Demon.description: Demon is a soul; that has been twisted into a foul shape.

features.name: Hellfire
features.effect: Unleashes damaging infernos, dealing {value} {damage} damage within {range}.

Ordealis Demon.description: A demon from the Ordealis realm.

features.name: Ordealis Curse
features.effect: Weakens enemy defenses, imposing a {condition} condition on a failed {check}.

Fey Demon.description: A demon with an otherworldly twist.

features.name: Fey Trickery
features.effect: Confuses foes, causing them to make a {check} or suffer the {condition} condition.

Dreamsea Demon.description: Born of nightmares and illusory seas.

features.name: Nightmare Wave
features.effect: Sends enemies into a fearful daze, applying {condition} for {duration}.

features.name: Mischief
features.effect: Disrupts enemy actions, imposing {condition} when interacting with abilities.

Greater Demon.description: A powerful demon of immense strength.

features.name: Demonic Strength
features.effect: Deals devastating blows, increasing melee {damage} damage by {value}.

Angelic Demon.description: A demon with a twisted, angelic aspect.

features.name: Fallen Grace
features.effect: Baffles foes with contradictory power, forcing them to make a {check} or suffer {condition}.

Abyssal Demon.description: A demon emerging from the abyss, embodying chaos.

features.name: Abyssal Roar
features.effect: Instills terror in enemies, forcing them to make a {check} or become {condition} for {duration}.

Eclipse Demon.description: A demon associated with eclipses and dark omens.

features.name: Shadow Rift
features.effect: Tears at the fabric of light, teleporting {range} and applying {condition} to creatures in the path.

Denizen.description: Urban dwellers of mystical cities (orcs, elves, dwarves, etc.), resourceful and diverse.

features.name: Streetwise
features.effect: Knows the hidden routes and secrets of the city, granting advantage on Observation or Survival checks for urban navigation.

urban tank.description: Brawlers, enforcers, and shield-bearers who dominate narrow alleys and doorways.

features.name: City Blockade
features.effect: Takes up an extra 5ft of space and may guard a choke point. Enemies provoke if moving past.

gutter mage.description: Uses twisted, scrapped-together magic. Knows the city's ley lines and arcane trash.

features.name: Scrap Spell
features.effect: May cast a spell with half cost and a glitchy side effect (roll on chaos table if one exists).

market broker.description: Smooth-talking dealers, con artists, and fence liaisons.

features.name: Greased Palms
features.effect: Once per encounter, bribe or persuade a hostile NPC to back off, buy time, or offer help.

dockhand professional.description: Engineers, fixers, or operatives with a working-class edge.

features.name: Problem Solver
features.effect: Can improvise a tool or bypass a simple mechanical obstacle once per scene.

medic runner.description: Mobile healers and urban aid workers who move fast through chaos.

features.name: Emergency Aid
features.effect: As an off-action, can stabilize a dying ally or grant them 5 temporary HP.

Dragon.description: Territorial and mighty creatures, each defined by the realm or element they embody.

features.name: Draconic Presence
features.effect: Creatures within short range must succeed a Spirit check or gain the Fear condition until end of turn.

viridian bile.description: Slick, acid-blooded dragons of caves and marshes.

features.name: Vile Bite
features.effect: Bite attack deals [[1d8]] acid damage.

crimson pyre.description: Proud, fire-born dragons with smoldering scales and searing tempers.

features.name: Fiery Presence
features.effect: Deal 1 fire damage to all in reach each turn. On enter/start: 1 fire damage.

glacial shard.description: Icy dragons of still mountains, cold and calculating.

features.name: Winter’s Freeze
features.effect: Target within reach gains Slowed condition until end of next turn.

cloudburst.description: Dragons of storm and thunder, revered as living tempests.

features.name: Sonic Roar
features.effect: All in reach must succeed Survival check or gain Deaf condition.

aquarion.description: Ocean-loving dragons with a tranquil presence and torrential wrath.

features.name: Tidal Breath
features.effect: Target must succeed Strength check or be pushed 10 ft (or -5 ft per success).

venom cloud.description: Toxic dragons of decay and manipulation.

features.name: Foul Claws
features.effect: Unarmed attacks deal an additional [[1d4]] toxic damage.

features.name: Lightning Reflexes
features.effect: Cannot be locked out of Agility checks. +1 Agility.

solarflare.description: Radiant golden dragons embodying the sun’s fury.

features.name: Solar Powered
features.effect: Gain +3 spell points until end of next turn.

ashen wisp.description: Shadow-breathing dragons that guide through wildfire and ruin.

features.name: Smoke Veil
features.effect: Advantage on Stealth, enemies have disadvantage on ranged attacks.

verdant whisper.description: Plant-bound dragons that act as forest guardians.

features.name: Draconic Barkskin
features.effect: +5 Armor. Speak to plants and animals in riddles.

shadowraith.description: Eclipse-born dragons that guide the dying.

features.name: Deathspeaker
features.effect: Communicate with uncommanded undead; they follow your will.

radiance.description: Divine dragons that shimmer with celestial judgment.

features.name: Divine Shield
features.effect: Grant a 1-hit radiant shield for 1 minute.

astraleon.description: Chaotic dragons that shimmer between thought and form.

features.name: Nemuri Shift
features.effect: Become semi-ethereal; take half damage and impose attack disadvantage.

vozurion.description: Vozian dragons of wrath and memory.

features.name: Nightmare Scream
features.effect: Force Spirit check or apply Fear. Immune afterward if passed.

thornspike.description: Barbed dragons driven by instinct and brute aggression.

features.name: Spiked Hide
features.effect: Melee attackers take 2 piercing damage on hit.

auric reaver.description: Massive, noble dragons of order and battle.

features.name: Reaper’s Tail
features.effect: Off- or Full-action tail attack deals [[1d6]] slashing damage.

crystal wyrm.description: Ancient gem-bodied dragons tied to balance and patience.

features.name: Boulder Bash
features.effect: +3 Armor; Impact attacks deal +3 damage.

Dreamsea.description: Born from the drifting waves of subconscious thought, Dreamsea creatures manifest illusion, madness, beauty, and horror. From pirate corsairs sailing starlit fog to the abyssal spawn of forgotten nightmares, these beings are unpredictable, unmoored, and unforgettable.

features.name: Illusory Veil
features.effect: Once per turn, force a nearby creature to make a Spirit or Observation check or become Confused until the end of their next turn.

nightmare larva.description: Primordial spawn from the depths of nightmare. Their shape is inconsistent, pulsing with memories that don’t belong.

features.name: Dream Corruption
features.effect: On hit, target gains a random Corpus condition from fear, sleep, or exhaustion themes.

dream pirate.description: Corsairs of the astral tides, they sail galleons of woven thought and prey on lucid travelers.

features.name: Lucid Ambush
features.effect: Gain advantage on attacks against targets who failed a Mental or Perception check in the last round.

harlequin shard.description: Fractured dream spirits that appear as shifting clowns, dancers, or masked figures.

features.name: Laughing Curse
features.effect: On contact, force a Spirit check or be forced to spend next action laughing uncontrollably (Staggered).

lucid horror.description: Aberrant beings that formed when someone became aware of their dream too late. Tentacled, reflective, half-familiar.

features.name: Echo Strike
features.effect: When a creature takes an action, the Lucid Horror can mimic it as an off-action once per encounter.

hypnosiren.description: Wingless, eyeless creatures that sing across dream-waves, luring minds deeper into unconscious traps.

features.name: Sleep Song
features.effect: Force a Spirit check. On failure, target is Drowsy or Staggered until the end of their next turn.

dreamseeker.description: Collectors of forgotten wishes and regrets, often appearing as masked wanderers or glowing orbs.

features.name: Memory Drain
features.effect: As an action, target forgets a known ally or ability for 1 round (DM chooses effect).

Eclipse.description: Creatures shrouded in darkness and the power of death.

features.name: Shadow Strike
features.effect: Delivers surprise attacks from darkness, dealing {value} {damage} damage and applying {condition}.

Undead.description: Reanimated corpses that serve dark forces.

features.name: Decay
features.effect: Weakens living creatures over time, reducing {check} results by {value}.

features.name: Blood Drain
features.effect: Steals life from its victims, healing for {value} per attack.

features.name: Grisly Bite
features.effect: Inflicts infection on contact, dealing {value} {damage} damage and applying {condition}.

Wraith.description: Ethereal beings that drain life force.

features.name: Ethereal Touch
features.effect: Saps the vitality of foes, dealing {value} {damage} damage and reducing {check} by {value}.

Elemental.description: A creature composed of raw elemental energies.

features.name: Elemental Surge
features.effect: Unleashes pure energy

acid.description: Corrosive energy that eats through matter.

features.name: Corrosive Touch
features.effect: Erodes armor and flesh

smoke.description: A shifting haze that obscures vision.

features.name: Obscuring Mist
features.effect: Reduces enemy accuracy

darkness.description: An embodiment of shadow that drains hope.

features.name: Umbral Veil
features.effect: Cloaks the area in darkness

fire.description: A blazing force that ignites everything.

features.name: Blazing Inferno
features.effect: Scorches foes with fire

plasma.description: Volatile, high-energy matter in constant flux.

features.name: Plasma Burst
features.effect: Releases explosive energy

features.name: Brittle Edges
features.effect: Cuts with surprising precision

ice.description: A frigid force that slows and shatters.

features.name: Frostbite
features.effect: Chills and cracks defenses

stone.description: Solid and enduring, with the power of earth.

features.name: Rock Solid
features.effect: Grants temporary resistance

lightning.description: A rapid strike of electrifying energy.

features.name: Storm Strike
features.effect: Electrocutes with high voltage

wire.description: Sharp and entangling, like barbed wire.

features.name: Barbed Trap
features.effect: Entangles and stuns

solar.description: Radiates with the brightness of the sun.

features.name: Radiant Burst
features.effect: Emits a blinding flash

thunder.description: A booming force that shakes the air.

features.name: Sonic Boom
features.effect: Disorients with powerful sound

features.name: Resonance
features.effect: Vibrates enemy bones

features.name: Venomous Cloud
features.effect: Releases toxic fumes

features.name: Irradiation
features.effect: Causes persistent sickness

features.name: Noxious Spray
features.effect: Poisons with each hit

features.name: Liquid Form
features.effect: Adapts its shape mid-combat

water.description: Washes over foes with unstoppable force.

features.name: Tidal Wave
features.effect: Knocks enemies off their feet

features.name: Slippery Coating
features.effect: Makes surfaces dangerously slick

features.name: Crimson Flow
features.effect: Saps strength from victims

features.name: Metallic Clang
features.effect: Stuns with reverberation

copper.description: Channels electric shocks through its body.

features.name: Electro-Copper
features.effect: Delivers electric bursts

features.name: Iron Will
features.effect: Boosts defensive power

features.name: Bronze Charge
features.effect: Delivers a devastating blow

features.name: Tempest Fury
features.effect: Unleashes a barrage of wind and rain

features.name: Emotional Surge
features.effect: Empowers nearby allies

Drain.description: Creatures that feed on magical, spiritual, or life essence from others.

features.name: Essence Leech
features.effect: Heals or empowers when it damages foes (gain half damage dealt as HP or resources).

mana drain.description: Draws power from magical or spellcasting targets.

features.name: Mana Drain
features.effect: Drains 1 spell point or weakens casting checks by -2 per PL.

life drain.description: Feeds on the vitality of living beings.

features.name: Vital Drain
features.effect: Deals damage and heals HP equal to half dealt.

spirit drain.description: Consumes morale, willpower, or inner strength.

features.name: Spiritual Drain
features.effect: Applies Fear or lowers Spirit-based checks each round.

energy drain.description: Feeds on raw energy from magical, mechanical, or elemental sources.

features.name: Energy Absorption
features.effect: Gains temporary armor or damage boost when hit by energy attacks.

Mimic.description: Creatures that mimic objects or beings to deceive their prey.

features.name: Camouflage
features.effect: Blends into surroundings for ambush

features.name: Object Impersonation
features.effect: Lures victims with a mundane disguise

features.name: Creature Imitation
features.effect: Assumes the form of another creature

features.name: Mirror Image
features.effect: Creates confusing duplicates

features.name: Fluid Form
features.effect: Adapts shape to evade or ambush

features.name: Draconic Roar
features.effect: Intimidates with a fearsome shout

taxi mimic.description: A mimic posing as a common vehicle.

features.name: Rideable Illusion
features.effect: Lures travelers with the promise of transport

treasure insect.description: Mimics a valuable find to ensnare prey.

features.name: Gleaming Lure
features.effect: Attracts with a shimmering appearance

mirror spector.description: Reflects the appearance of others perfectly.

features.name: Reflective Form
features.effect: Baffles enemies with mirrored images

Mutant.description: Creatures warped by unstable forces—magic, radiation, forbidden knowledge. Unpredictable, often grotesque.

features.name: Adaptive Mutation
features.effect: Once per combat, randomly replace one of its features with a new one from another monster type.

fleshshaper.description: Twisted flesh reformers with unstable limbs.

features.name: Lashing Growths
features.effect: Gain a random reach-based unarmed attack each round (+5 ft range, [[1d6]] damage).

mindspike.description: Psychically unstable mutants that radiate pain and thought.

features.name: Mental Howl
features.effect: Force all creatures within short range to make a Spirit check or take 1d4 psychic damage and Disoriented condition.

warpborn.description: Creatures blink in and out of reality or spatial geometry.

features.name: Phase Step
features.effect: Once per round, teleport up to 10 ft before or after an attack.

toxin host.description: Laced with unstable toxins that seep from skin, breath, or claws.

features.name: Toxic Sweat
features.effect: Creatures in melee take [[1d4]] toxic damage at the start of their turn if they remain in contact.

chimera strain.description: Multi-animal hybrids, grafted forms built for pure aggression.

features.name: Hybrid Strike
features.effect: Can make two attacks of different types each turn (bite + claw, tail + slam, etc.).

arcane-warped.description: Spell-mutated beings that flicker with wild magic.

features.name: Unstable Pulse
features.effect: At the start of each round, roll [[1d6]] to determine a random elemental aura (fire, cold, lightning, etc.) that deals [[1d4]] damage to nearby enemies.

bonecrown.description: Mutants with exposed skeletal growth and armor.

features.name: Spinal Plating
features.effect: +3 Armor. Melee attackers take 1 piercing damage when they strike you.

Beast.description: Mammals, reptiles, and amphibians driven by instinct or territorial nature.

features.name: Savage Pounce
features.effect: On a successful hit after moving 10ft, the target is knocked prone.

features.name: Territorial Roar
features.effect: Forces enemies within 10ft to make a Fear check or lose their next reaction.

predator.description: Stalks prey with cunning and patience.

features.name: Kill Zone
features.effect: Gains advantage on attacks against isolated targets.

features.name: Pack Tactics
features.effect: Gain +2 to hit if an ally is adjacent to the target.

giant.description: An oversized version of its species.

features.name: Massive Frame
features.effect: Ignores difficult terrain and deals +5 damage on all melee attacks.

dire.description: Unusually savage and twisted by the wild.

features.name: Blood Frenzy
features.effect: Gains an extra attack when under half HP.

tamed.description: Domesticated or trained, though still deadly.

features.name: Obedient Strike
features.effect: Acts immediately after its controller.

alpha.description: Leader of its kind, asserts dominance.

features.name: Dominating Aura
features.effect: Nearby beasts deal +2 damage while within 20ft.

Insect.description: Hive-minded, carapaced, and relentless — from crawling swarms to armored titans.

features.name: Exoskeletal Plating
features.effect: Reduces all incoming damage by 2 per PL.

features.name: Insectile Vision
features.effect: Cannot be blinded and ignores visual illusions.

swarm.description: Made of many tiny creatures acting as one.

features.name: Mass Body
features.effect: Immune to single-target effects; weak to area attacks.

features.name: Brood Pulse
features.effect: Summons 1d4 swarmlings each round.

features.name: Tunnel Ambush
features.effect: May emerge under a target to deal surprise damage.

camouflaged.description: Blends into terrain like bark, rock, or sand.

features.name: Natural Camouflage
features.effect: Invisible while not moving in natural terrain.

venomous.description: Injects toxins to paralyze or weaken.

features.name: Toxin Bite
features.effect: On hit, target must roll or gain a random condition (Weakened, Slowed, Confused).

flying.description: Takes to the air with buzzing wings.

features.name: Aerial Agility
features.effect: Disadvantage to melee attacks against this creature while flying.

Plant.description: Ambulatory flora, animated vines, sentient roots — patient and predatory.

features.name: Photosynthetic Shielding
features.effect: Heals 2 HP per turn while in sunlight or water-rich areas.

features.name: Rootgrasp
features.effect: All terrain within 10ft becomes difficult terrain for non-flying creatures.

features.name: Branch Slam
features.effect: Deals impact damage in a 10ft cone in front of it.

creeper.description: Sprawling vine networks that constrict prey.

features.name: Constrict
features.effect: Target must succeed a Strength check or be grappled each turn.

blossom lure.description: Radiates beauty or scent to deceive.

features.name: Pollen Trap
features.effect: Creatures within 10ft must roll or be charmed for 1 round.

features.name: Spore Cloud
features.effect: Releases a 10ft cloud that causes nausea or blindness.

features.name: Fungal Rebirth
features.effect: Killed creatures rise as mushroom zombies for 1 turn.

thorn wall.description: Defensive and immobile but heavily barbed.

features.name: Reactive Thorns
features.effect: Deals piercing damage to melee attackers.

Aquatic.description: Creatures of the rivers, lakes, and sea — sleek, alien, or abyssal.

features.name: Aquatic Adaptation
features.effect: Unhindered in water, can breathe both air and water.

features.name: Jet Movement
features.effect: Can move 30ft as a reaction once per round while submerged.

tidecaller.description: Harnesses water itself as a weapon.

features.name: Wave Crash
features.effect: Deals force damage in a 15ft cone and pushes targets back.

deep one.description: Twisted being from the ocean's deepest trenches.

features.name: Crushing Pressure
features.effect: Deals extra damage to enemies not adapted to deep water.

coral beast.description: Covered in razor coral or hardened barnacles.

features.name: Shard Armor
features.effect: Attacks against it deal 2 piercing damage to the attacker.

siren.description: Uses voice or illusion to lure prey.

features.name: Luring Song
features.effect: Forces a Spirit check or causes the target to approach.

leviathan.description: A massive and ancient sea predator.

features.name: Tidal Devour
features.effect: Deals massive area damage, ignoring armor if submerged.

tide crawler.description: Fast and agile in water or along rocky shores.

features.name: Skittering Dash
features.effect: Can move across vertical surfaces while wet.

Ordealis.description: Demons forged across the infernal layers of the Ordealis, each shaped by unique trials. From dismembered remnants to ascendant horrors of philosophy and pain.

features.name: Demonic Resilience
features.effect: Resists fire, necrotic, and cognition-based effects.

features.name: Hell Echo
features.effect: Once per combat, mimic a recently used ability from another creature.

lesser demon.description: Detached limbs or chunks of demons still animated with hatred.

features.name: Severed Hunger
features.effect: Claws, jaws, or limbs scramble toward living creatures and cling. If latched, the target has -2 to checks until removed.

features.name: Residual Will
features.effect: Despite lacking heads, these parts still act with purpose. Immune to mind-affecting effects.

desolate.description: Silent demons of cracked stone, shaped in the Fields of Desolation.

features.name: Stone Endure
features.effect: Can ignore one cognition condition per rest with a successful Survival check.

rustfiend.description: Demons of labor and utility, born in the Iron Dominion.

features.name: Iron Embrace
features.effect: Once per rest, gain armor equal to Strength for 1 minute.

soulshade.description: Whispering ghosts from the fractured Clockwork Abyss.

features.name: Spirit Channel
features.effect: Once per rest, gain advantage on a Mental check via a lingering spirit.

inkshadow.description: Memory-drunk archivists from the Library of Demons.

features.name: Tomebound Recall
features.effect: Once per rest, recall secret knowledge about a target or environment.

echo horn.description: Sonic devourers from the Discordant Symphony.

features.name: Soundburst
features.effect: Force a nearby creature to make a Survival check or become Confused.

icereaver.description: Frozen sentinels from the Silent Void.

features.name: Frost Touch
features.effect: Inflict or remove Slowed/Pinned on touch, once per rest.

mistfire.description: Unstable demons from the River of Forgotten Souls.

features.name: Mistform
features.effect: Become intangible or invisible until end of next turn, once per rest.

warshade.description: Blood-tempered warriors from the Fields of Torment.

features.name: War Fury
features.effect: Gain an additional melee attack at disadvantage once per turn.

moraltus.description: Order-driven enforcers from the Temple of Asmodeus.

features.name: Serene Command
features.effect: As a half-action, remove a cognition condition from an ally.

vozian.description: Twisted mortals tainted by VoZo’s fall.

features.name: Skin of Hate
features.effect: Once per rest, reflect half the damage or main effect of a spell on a Luck check.

abyssal.description: Massive, galaxy-eyed demons of consuming void.

features.name: Lost in the Abyss
features.effect: While grappling, force a soul check; on failure the target is marked or consumed by the abyss.

Shifter.description: Chameleons of nature, flesh, or parasitic origin — these beings shift form or blend with others to survive, deceive, or dominate.

features.name: Morphic Form
features.effect: As a half-action, change body shape or disguise as another creature type. Gain +2 to Deception or Stealth for one round after shifting.

gloomspawn.description: Parasitic symbiotes that reshape hosts with living goo.

features.name: Goop Shifter
features.effect: As a half-action, create a melee weapon of your choice. It dissolves after impact if thrown or dropped.

devourer.description: Aggressive symbiotes that consume control of the host.

features.name: Predatory Control
features.effect: Gain +1 to melee attack rolls and healing ability (6 HP or remove Corpus condition) once per day.

eternal worm.description: Ancient memory-bonded symbiotes offering knowledge and latent magic.

features.name: Soul Bond
features.effect: Gain one starting feature from any class, path, or talent. Chosen once and locked in.

passenger.description: Secretive infiltrators that remain undetected while influencing hosts.

features.name: Cloak Within
features.effect: As an action, the host becomes Invisible until their next aggressive action or end of turn.

mimic-meld.description: Shifters that copy appearance and mannerisms of a specific target.

features.name: Mirror Flesh
features.effect: Can take the physical form and voice of any Small or Medium creature they've observed for 1 minute.

wildform.description: Primal shifters that adapt beast traits in combat.

features.name: Instinctive Mutation
features.effect: Choose each round: +10 speed, climb speed, swim speed, or natural weapon attack [[1d6]].

void echo.description: Otherworldly shifters that rewrite biology mid-fight.

features.name: Reactive Morph
features.effect: Once per round when taking damage, change one resistance or add a temporary limb/weapon until end of next turn.

Frontline.description: Close-quarters combatants built for resilience and melee power.

features.name: Crushing Blow
features.effect: Delivers devastating physical strikes.

features.name: Defensive Stance
features.effect: Bolsters defenses and shields allies.

features.name: Raging Assault
features.effect: Unleashes a flurry of powerful strikes.

features.name: Glorious Strike
features.effect: Deals extra damage to challenging foes.

features.name: Unyielding Guard
features.effect: Reduces incoming damage while holding the front line.

Ranged.description: Ranged specialists who strike from a distance.

features.name: Explosive Charge
features.effect: Deals area damage with a burst of energy.

features.name: Deadeye Shot
features.effect: Hits weak points for extra critical damage.

features.name: Piercing Volley
features.effect: Fires a barrage that passes through enemies.

features.name: Suppressive Fire
features.effect: Reduces enemy movement with continuous fire.

Stealth.description: Experts in deception, subterfuge, and precise eliminations.

features.name: Stealth Strike
features.effect: Delivers critical damage when undetected.

features.name: Shadow Cloak
features.effect: Becomes invisible for a short time.

features.name: Silent Execution
features.effect: Kills instantly if a target is unaware.

features.name: Poison Blade
features.effect: Laces weapons with debilitating toxins.

Magic.description: Spellcasters who wield magic to control the battlefield.

features.name: Arcane Blast
features.effect: Unleashes a burst of magical energy.

features.name: Temporal Shift
features.effect: Slows enemies by bending time.

features.name: Mental Onslaught
features.effect: Bombards foes with psychic energy.

features.name: Reality Tear
features.effect: Disrupts physical space to create dangerous rifts.

Support.description: Healers and enablers who empower allies.

features.name: Healing Touch
features.effect: Rapidly restores health to injured allies.

features.name: Divine Prayer
features.effect: Calls upon divine intervention for protection.

features.name: Medical Expertise
features.effect: Cures ailments and wounds with precision.

features.name: Inspiring Presence
features.effect: Boosts the morale and effectiveness of allies.

Mystic.description: Unconventional beings with unique abilities beyond standard combat roles.

features.name: Celestial Aura
features.effect: Grants blessings that empower allies.

features.name: Gravity Well
features.effect: Manipulates mass to hinder enemies.

features.name: Foretelling
features.effect: Predicts enemy moves to gain tactical advantage.

features.name: Reality Distortion
features.effect: Causes strange and unpredictable effects on the battlefield.

Nature.description: Creatures infused with elemental power or the raw force of nature.

features.name: Primal Roar
features.effect: Channels the raw power of nature to intimidate foes.

features.name: Spore Cloud
features.effect: Releases toxic spores that weaken enemies.

features.name: Earthen Bind
features.effect: Uses the land itself to trap opponents.

features.name: Elemental Surge
features.effect: Unleashes bursts of elemental energy.

Tactician.description: Masters of planning, knowledge, and calculated strikes.

features.name: Uncover Truth
features.effect: Exposes enemy vulnerabilities.

features.name: Defensive Tactician
features.effect: Anticipates and counters attacks effectively.

features.name: Sacred Strike
features.effect: Delivers righteous blows that smite evil.

features.name: Strategic Insight
features.effect: Predicts and outmaneuvers enemies.

Mundane.description: Practical, physical, or tactical changes to a creature.

features.name: Thick Hide
features.effect: Increase armor by 5 times PL

features.name: Enhanced Reflexes
features.effect: Attacks against this creature have -5 to hit.

features.name: Bulky
features.effect: Moves slower but is harder to push around.

features.name: Silent Stalker
features.effect: Moves unnoticed and ambushes prey.

features.name: Tunnel Maker
features.effect: Excavates tunnels to surprise enemies.

Defender.description: Creature with perfect defense or preperation against all damage types except one

features.name: Perfect Defense
features.effect: All damage types deal only 1 damage per attack except one chosen damage type

Weak.description: a weak creature, seems frail and barely able to stand

features.name: Weak
features.effect: Start with half normal HP, checks at -1 per PL

Supernatural.description: Otherworldly or mystical alterations to a creature.

features.name: Mystic Flight
features.effect: Grants the ability to hover and maneuver magically.

features.name: Undying
features.effect: Sustains itself through magical regeneration.

features.name: Venomous Bite
features.effect: Injects toxins that paralyze enemies.

features.name: Spore Burst
features.effect: Releases toxic spores to impair foes.

features.name: Elemental Boost
features.effect: Augments elemental damage output.

Mutations.description: Unnatural or corrupted traits, often unstable in nature.

features.name: Tainted Aura
features.effect: Weakens nearby beings with corrupt energy.

features.name: Life Leech
features.effect: Drains strength from its host to bolster itself.

features.name: Planar Shift
features.effect: Flickers between dimensions to evade attacks.

features.name: Cursed Decay
features.effect: Weakens armor and corrodes metal.

features.name: Shifting Form
features.effect: Alters its appearance to confuse attackers.

Command.description: Denotes leadership, servitude, or group combat effectiveness.

features.name: Regal Command
features.effect: Boosts the morale of allies and intimidates foes.

features.name: Oppressive Rule
features.effect: Enforces obedience in its presence.

features.name: Commanding Presence
features.effect: Inspires and directs allies effectively.

features.name: Swarm Tactics
features.effect: Excels when operating as part of a horde.

features.name: Obedient
features.effect: Follows commands without question.

Quick.description: Hyper-fast or jittery creatures that interrupt turn flow.

features.name: Interruptive Assault
features.effect: May attack after each player turn (once per round per PL).

features.name: Accelerated Motion
features.effect: Takes an extra movement action on its turn.

Immune.description: Possesses complete immunity to a specific damage type.

features.name: Damage Nullification
features.effect: Immune to one damage type (narrator chooses or rolls).

features.name: Selective Weakness
features.effect: Optional: Takes double damage from another specified type.
